§ Foundry Toolkit

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

The **Foundry Toolkit** is a set of tools for the [[solidity-programming-language]].

The tools in the **Foundry Toolkit** are:

• ``anvil``
• ``cast``
• ``chisel``
• ``forge``

§§ Create New Project

To create a new project run:

``forge init``
